db:info.db:title: Qt Quick Demo - Maroon in Trouble

db:abstract.db:para: A Qt Quick game for touch devices that uses SpriteSequence, ParticleSystem, Emitter, and Wander types to animate objects and the SoundEffect type to play sound effects.

db:article.db:programlisting:
TEMPLATE = app
QT += qml quick qtHaveModule(multimedia): QT += multimedia SOURCES += main.cpp RESOURCES += maroon.qrc
target.path = $$[QT_INSTALL_EXAMPLES]/quick/demos/maroon INSTALLS += target
